job.title: Software Sr. Engineer RWF
job.description: stronguJob DescriptionbrbrustrongImportant Note During the application process ensure your contact information email and phone number is up to date and upload your current resume when submitting your application for consideration To participate in some selection activities you will need to respond to an invitation The invitation can be sent by both email and text message In order to receive text message invitations your profile must include a mobile phone number designated as Personal Cell or Cellular in the contact information of your applicationbrbrAt Wells Fargo we are looking for talented people who will put our customers at the center of everything we do We are seeking candidates who embrace diversity equity and inclusion in a workplace where everyone feels valued and inspiredbrbrHelp us build a better Wells Fargo It all begins with outstanding talent It all begins with youbrbrTechnology sets IT strategy enhances the design development and operations of our systems optimizes the Wells Fargo infrastructure provides information security and enables Wells Fargo global customers to have 24 hours a day 7 days a week banking access through inbranch online ATMs and other channelsbrbrOur mission is to deliver stable secure scalable and innovative services at speeds that delight and satisfy our customers and unleash the skills potential of our employeesbrbrThe Digital Technology and Innovation group supports the Corporate Strategy Digital Platform amp Innovation Business Together they work closely to continue evolving Wells Fargos digital platforms and enhance integration of the innovation pipeline into our customerfacing capabilitiesbrbrDigital Technology is driven to deliver the bestinclass online and mobile services to our customers Digital is the focal point for all the technology supporting the Internet and Mobile Channels Our dedicated team members and partners deliver maintain and support high quality software solutions ensuring that Wells Fargos virtual store is always open and available via online tablet or mobile to help our customers succeed financiallybrbrWe are currently looking for a Software Engineer to help build support and maintain Online Banking within the Digital Technology Channels organizationbrbrstronguResponsibilities Include but Not Limited TobrustrongulliWork closely with Business Partners Scrum masters and engineers to design and develop application solutions that are secure reliable and reusable componentsliliWork within a team environment to help solve complex business requirements while utilizing enterprise and industry best practices liliWork in coordination with engineers in the team to ensure all application code is defect free before being deployed to production environmentsliliEnsure quality security and compliance requirements are met as part of application development activitiesliliWork in an agile application development lifecycle with deployments to production every three weeksbrliulRWF  Please note that RWF is an identifier for internal recruiting purposes only and has no connection to the nature or responsibilities of the jobbrbrstronguRequired Qualificationsbrustrongulli7 years of software engineering experiencelili8 years of Spring experiencelili8  years of Core Java experiencelili5  years of JSON JavaScript Object Notation development experiencelili4 years of RESTful or SOAP web serviceslili2 years of experience in microservices developmentlili2 years of MongoDB experiencelili2 years of experience in Hadoop ecosystem tools for realtime batch data ingestion processing and provisioning such as Apache Flume Apache Kafka Apache Sqoop Apache Flink Apache Spark or Apache Stormlili2 years of online banking experiencelili2 years of experience with Kafka and PubSub patterns toolslili4 years of experience in one or combination of the following leading cross functional teams enterprisewide projects or directly managing peoplebrliulstronguDesired QualificationsbrustrongulliAn industrystandard technology certificationliliStrong verbal written and interpersonal communication skillsliliKnowledge and understanding of test driven application developmentliliAbility to design develop and implement large scalecomplex software applicationsliliKnowledge and understanding of design and development of modern web applications and mobile technologieslili4 years of Agile experiencebrliulstronguOther Desired QualificationsbrustrongulliWells Fargo Online Banking modules amp development practiceslili5 years experience with SDLC tools and processes including GitHub Jenkins Artifactory Sonar Maven or Gradlelili4  years of experience in developing JUnit test casesliliKnowledge of Behavior Driven Development BDDbrliulstrongDisclaimerbrbrstrongAll offers for employment with Wells Fargo are contingent upon the candidate having successfully completed a criminal background check Wells Fargo will consider qualified candidates with criminal histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of applicable local state and Federal law including Section 19 of the Federal Deposit Insurance ActbrbrRelevant military experience is considered for veterans and transitioning service men and womenbrbrWells Fargo is an Affirmative Action and Equal Opportunity Employer
